snippet: The former New York Times food editor’s version is simple, rich and easily accessorized with ripe fruit or flavorings. (Article plus video.)
abstract: Sam Sifton Times Classic column offers recipe for Craig Claiborne's deluxe cheesecake.
lead_paragraph: The former New York Times food editor’s version is simple, rich and easily accessorized with ripe fruit or flavorings. (Article plus video.)

headline.print_headline: New York’s Claim to Cheesecake Fame
